def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    zeros = sequence.count('0')
    new_sequence = '0'*zeros + first_digit + sequence.replace(first_digit, '', 1)
    return new_sequence

def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    zeros = sequence.count('0')
    new_sequence = '0'*zeros + first_digit + sequence.replace(first_digit, '', 1)
    return new_sequence
